comments.body: Side note: I wonder if it'd be reasonable to have some CLI flag for requesting to prefer podman executable over docker explicitly... (Sure it's out of scope here but still it's a topic to discuss)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@minor_changes:
  - ansible-test - now makes a better attempt to support podman when calling ``docker images`` and asking for JSON format.
